# luxUnit(with:)

**Type Method**

Returns a HealthKit unit for measuring illuminance, using lux units with the provided prefix.

## Declaration

```swift
class func luxUnit(with prefix: HKMetricPrefix) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **prefix**: A valid metric prefix value. For the complete list of prefix values, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKMetricPrefix].
title: luxUnit(with:)
